product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: B. | EXTERNAL HYDRANT, SPRINKLER LINE & FDA
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe of 7 mm Heavy grade conforming to IS : 3589 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved  primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipes shall be erected with grooved joints only. All sorts of escavation, pedestal support and structural support shall be of vendor's scope. 200 NB(FOR REVAMPING OF HYDRANT LINE)
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(black steel), grade: heavy, standard: indian standard 3589 part-1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, coating: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint type: grooved, feature: all sorts of excavation, pedestal support and structural support shall be of vendor's scope

Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe of 7 mm Heavy grade conforming to IS : 3589 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved  primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipes shall be erected with grooved joints only. All sorts of escavation, pedestal support and structural support shall be of vendor's scope.

Supply, fabrication and erection of MS Structural material for various kind of supports consistes of angle, channels, I sections, plates etc including nuts, bolts and washers.
Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of analogue addressable outdoor type Manual Call point explosion proof complete with fittings and accessories.
Supply, erection, testing & commissioning of External Hooter cum strobe(IP 67 rating) complete with fittings and accessories.

Supply & installation of  portable foam tank of 250 ltr.
